1: Friday morning: The beginning of the last day of a hellish week.
2: The only thing I have to look forward to today is a hackathon at a gaming convention I'm attending later; Version Alpha.
3: I'm a student but I also have a full-time job at a local computer repair shop.
4: I've been working there for a year.... but my real passion is making games.
5: That passion is why I'm pursuing a computer science degree at my university.
6: Degrees don't come for free though--- (pause) hence, the full-time job.
7: My job has become a drag recently though.
8: I just don't look forward to showing up to work anymore, it's usually slow and I just can't concentrate.
9: So, my game plan to get me through today?
11: I love this place and fortunately today the line is insanely short.
12: I already know my order and I am so ready for the power of coffee to turn on my brain.
14: .... OK .. I just want my coffee, and this is taking longer than I originally planned...
15: I wonder what is taking so long. Usually this place has a good wait time.
16: Okay, the baristas are definitely handling lot more cups than there are people here.
17: The girl in front of me must have ordered for her whole office floor....
18: Someone behind me is saying something...
20: "mother of god, if this fatty wouldn't have ordered 10 Frappuccinos I would have my damn coffee already"
24: He seems extremely grumpy. ...and he's looking at me.....
30: "Do me a favor. Order my coffee for me."
32: He just handed me some cash and ran out the door to take his call.
34: He didn't even tell me what he wanted
37: The cashier is calling me forward. I hope I get something he likes... I'm going to order him a....
38: begin split between black coffee and Frappuccino
41: I ordered him a black coffee because it seems like he's a grouchy pants that could use some caffeine.
42: I'm gonna just walk to the door and... there he is!
46: I hand him the black coffee. He takes a sip.
50: "Amazing.. you got exactly what I wanted... thanks. You saved me there."
51: "Drinking my coffee is one of my most favorite parts of my day."
54: After his grumpy face is wiped off he looks slightly... no wait- really handsome.
56: "You're welcome, I'm glad you like it. I just got what I usually order here."
59: I get the feeling this is a rare expression from him.
60: I'm glad I was able to make him smile.
62: "No kidding? Most people I know don't enjoy the bitterness of a plain americano."
65: sorry, thought i needed these and then didn't
